pages.text: Li ej stabilizers (mont) ter lest gxi tumbles vi tro as river roads vi direkt
landmarks ankaux as stel; al uz navigation
est 1 who kre 1 who ne kre? Vi tuj pren heed
Vi count di blessings vi possibly ne encompass them. DI est Forgiver Merciful
DI kon whatever vi conceal whatever vi deklar
As por idols ili set DI ili ne kre anything; ili kre
Ili est dead ne alive ili ne hav ide kiel when ili resurrected
Your di est 1 di. As por those ne kred en Hereafter their kor denying ili est arrogant
Absolutely DI kon cxio ili conceal cxio ili deklar. Li ne am those est arrogant
When ili pet Ki do vi opini da these revelations el your Lord ili dir Tales el preter
Ili ten responsible por their pek Tag Resurrection all da them ankaux al pek de all those ili misled their ignorance. Ki miserable load
Others them schemed en des preter, consequently DI detru their mason fundament kauxz tegment fal them. retribution strik them when ili malplej expected
